mcq.statement: Choose the grammatically correct sentence: The musician whom performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player, The musician which performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player, The musician who performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player, The musician that performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player

options.a: The musician whom performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player
options.b: The musician that performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player
options.c: The musician who performed at the 11th Hyderabad Literature Festival is a famous sitar player
